mapper.select:
select n.photo, n.title, m.id, n.num_novel, n.age, n.end, e.num_episode, e.max_make from member m join novel n ON n.num_member = m.num_member join liken l ON n.num_novel = l.num_novel LEFT JOIN ( SELECT num_novel, COUNT(*) AS num_episode, MAX(make) AS max_make FROM episode GROUP BY num_novel ) e ON n.num_novel = e.num_novel WHERE l.num_member = #{num_member}
AND n.title LIKE '%'||#{search}||'%'
order by e.max_make
DESC
mapper.delete: delete from liken where num_member=#{num_member} and num_novel=#{num_novel}
